docs.lead_paragraph: SWIFTLY changing styles of life coupled with energy considera tions and sky-high house prices are producing a situation where, as we go into the 1980's, the Connecticut perception of what constitutes an ideal home is undergoing a profound metamorphosis.

headline.main: CONNECTICUT HOUSING; The Market's Painful Metamorphosis

docs.abstract: Article on housing needs in Conn for '80s; notes swiftly changing life styles, coupled with energy considerations and sky-high house prices, are profoundly changing perception of what constitutes ideal home; illus (L)
